<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Clickable Items</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            background-color: #f4f4f4;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .item {
            display: inline-block;
            margin: 20px;
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            padding: 10px;
            background-color: white;
            transition: transform 0.2s;
        }
        .item:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }
        img {
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            object-fit: cover;
        }
        h3 {
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #333;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <h1>Welcome to My Page</h1>
    <p>Click on an item below to read more about it!</p>

    <div class="item">
        <a href="blog/item1.html">
            <img src="images/item1.jpg" alt="Item 1">
            <h3>Item 1</h3>
        </a>
    </div>

    <div class="item">
        <a href="blog/item2.html">
            <img src="images/item2.jpg" alt="Item 2">
            <h3>Item 2</h3>
        </a>
    </div>

    <!-- Add more items as needed -->

</body>
</html>
